Detailed Description

cvmx_sata_uahc_gbl_bistafr

This register is shared between SATA ports. Before accessing this register, first select the required port by writing the port number to the SATA()_UAHC_GBL_TESTR[PSEL] field.

This register contains the pattern definition (bits 23:16 of the first DWORD) and the data pattern (bits 7:0 of the second DWORD) fields of the received BIST activate FIS.
